company_website.label: Your company website
company_website.helper: Please provide the URL of your company's website

company_operational_address.helper: Only fill this field if your operational address is different from the official headquarter address

company_activity.helper: Please explain in a few words what your company does and how it is connected to cryptocurrencies

personal_address.label: Your personal address
personal_address.helper: Please provide your personal residential adress

are_you_a_pep.label: Are you, or any beneficial owner of the company, considered as a PEP?
are_you_a_pep.helper: A politically exposed person (PEP) is an individual with a high profile political role, or someone who has been entrusted with a prominent public function

are_you_a_us_person.label: Are you, or any beneficial owner of the company, a US Person?
are_you_a_us_person.helper: A "U.S. person" is any citizen of the United States (including a person born in the United States who resides abroad and who has not renounced his American citizenship); any legal resident of the United States (including a US green card holder); and any permanent resident of the United States.

payment_details.title: Your payment details
payment_details.description: Please provide instructions on what should be done with the funds received through Nilos

what_should_we_do_with_the_funds_you_rec.label: What should we do with the funds you receive on Nilos?
what_should_we_do_with_the_funds_you_rec.helper: If you want your funds to be converted into FIAT and transferred to the bank account you will register, please select the first option and fill the next 3 fields. Your company must be the owner of the bank account. If you want your crypto funds to be sent to an external wallet, please select the second option and send an email to compliance@nilos.io with the beneficiary wallet address information. You don't need to fill the next 3 fields if you picked this option.

options.Any crypto received on my Nilos account: Any crypto received on my Nilos account has to be automatically exchanged into FIAT and transferred to the bank account below
Any crypto received on my Nilos account has to be automatically transferred to an external wallet I will communicate to Nilos

iban_account_number.label: IBAN / Account number
iban_account_number.helper: Please enter here your IBAN or your Account Number

your_currency.label: Your currency
your_currency.helper: Please select the currency in which you would like to receive your funds. If your currency is not on the list, please send an email to compliance@nilos.io
